verses.roman:
tomāra yaiche viṣaya-tyāga, taiche tāṅra rīti
dainya-vairāgya-pāṇḍityera tāṅhātei sthiti

synonyms: tomāra—your; yaiche—just as; viṣaya-tyāga—renunciation of material connections; taiche—similarly; tāṅra rīti—his manner of activity; dainya—humbleness; vairāgya—renunciation; pāṇḍityera—of learned scholarship; tāṅhātei—in him; sthiti—existing.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu told Rāmānanda Rāya, "Sanātana Gosvāmī's renunciation of material connections is just like yours. Humility, renunciation and excellent learning exist in him simultaneously.
